entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A group of people who are loyal to Lord Voldemort. They are mentioned as being suspected of holding Stan Shunpike captive.

entities.name: stan shunpike
entities.description: A person who is being held captive by the Death Eaters. He is mentioned as being interviewed by Scrimgeour.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as trying to appeal directly to Scrimgeour about Stan Shunpike.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: A person who has interviewed Stan Shunpike. He is mentioned as being involved in the decision to keep Stan captive.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as asking if Stan Shunpike is still being held captive.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour has interviewed Stan Shunpike, but the interview did not reveal any evidence of Stan being a Death Eater.
Dumbledore has appealed directly to Scrimgeour about Stan Shunpike, but the outcome is not mentioned.
Harry is concerned about Stan Shunpike's well-being and asks if he is still being held captive.
Mr Weasley has informed Harry that Scrimgeour is involved in the decision to keep Stan Shunpike captive.
